TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IMigrationsDatabaseLock implements class System.IAsyncDisposable, class System.IDisposable
Public Interface IMigrationsDatabaseLock Implements IAsyncDisposable, IDisposable
type IMigrationsDatabaseLock = interface interface IDisposable interface IAsyncDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents an exclusive lock on the database that is used to ensure that only one migration application can be run at a time.
Docs.remarks: Typically only database providers implement this.

Indicates whether the transaction was restarted. if there's no current transaction.
Docs.summary: Acquires an exclusive lock on the database again if the current one was already released.
Docs.returns: An object that can be disposed to release the lock.
